pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā rājagahe viharati veḷuvane kalandakanivāpe.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohantā addasaṁsu chagalakaṁ ajikāya vippaṭipajjantaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.4_0: “handa mayaṁ, āvuso, imaṁ chagalakaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ nāma karoma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.5_0: Imaṁ ajikaṁ mettiyaṁ nāma bhikkhuniṁ karoma.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.7_0: Pubbe mayaṁ, āvuso, dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ sutena avocumhā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.8_0: Idāni pana amhehi sāmaṁ diṭṭho mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.9_0: Te taṁ chagalakaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ nāma akaṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.10_0: Taṁ ajikaṁ mettiyaṁ nāma bhikkhuniṁ akaṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.12_0: “pubbe mayaṁ, āvuso, dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ sutena avocumhā.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.13_0: Idāni pana amhehi sāmaṁ diṭṭho mettiyāya bhikkhuniyā vippaṭipajjanto”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.17_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.18_0: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ paṭipucchi—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.19_0: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathayime bhikkhū āhaṁsū”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.22_0: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ etadavoca—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.23_0: “sarasi tvaṁ, dabba, evarūpaṁ kattā yathayime bhikkhū āhaṁsū”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.28_0: “Yato ahaṁ, bhante, jāto nābhijānāmi supinantenapi methunadhammaṁ paṭisevitā, pageva jāgaro”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.29_0: Atha kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi—“tena hi, bhikkhave, ime bhikkhū anuyuñjathā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.1.30_0: Idaṁ vatvā bhagavā uṭṭhāyāsanā vihāraṁ pāvisi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.1_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū anuyuñjiṁsu.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.2_0: Te bhikkhūhi anuyuñjīyamānā bhikkhūnaṁ etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.3_1: āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.5_0: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.6_0: “kathañhi nāma mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.6_1: desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsessantī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.7_0: Atha kho te bhikkhū mettiyabhūmajake bhikkhū anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.8_2: dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsethā”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.11_2: dabbaṁ mallaputtaṁ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁsessatha.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.13_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.14.1_0: “Yo pana bhikkhu bhikkhuṁ duṭṭho doso appatīto aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṁ lesamattaṁ upādāya
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.14.1_1: pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṁseyya— ‘appeva nāma naṁ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyan’ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:1.2.15_0: Tato aparena samayena samanuggāhīyamāno vā asamanuggāhīyamāno vā aññabhāgiyañceva taṁ adhikaraṇaṁ hoti koci deso lesamatto upādinno,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.1.10_0: tena ca kopena, tena ca dosena, tāya ca anattamanatāya, tāya ca anabhiraddhiyā appatīto hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.2.12_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṁ āpattādhikaraṇassa siyā tabbhāgiyaṁ siyā aññabhāgiyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.2_0: leso nāma dasa lesā— jātileso, nāmaleso,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.4_0: khattiyo diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.9_0: natthi tayā saddhiṁ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṁ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.22_0: saṅgharakkhito diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.31_0: vāsiṭṭho diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.40_0: odāto diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.53_0: sumbhakapattadharo diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.60_0: gahapaticīvaradharo diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.66_0: itthannāmassa saddhivihāriko diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.72_0: itthannāmassa antevāsiko diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.78_0: itthannāmasenāsanavāsiko diṭṭho hoti pārājikaṁ dhammaṁ ajjhāpajjanto.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.3.83_0: natthi tayā saddhiṁ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṁ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.5_0: Appeva nāma naṁ imamhā brahmacariyā cāveyyanti
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.6_0: bhikkhubhāvā cāveyyaṁ, samaṇadhammā cāveyyaṁ, sīlakkhandhā cāveyyaṁ, tapoguṇā cāveyyaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.8_0: yasmiṁ khaṇe anuddhaṁsito hoti, taṁ khaṇaṁ taṁ layaṁ taṁ muhuttaṁ vītivatte.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.10_0: yena vatthunā anuddhaṁsito hoti tasmiṁ vatthusmiṁ samanuggāhīyamāno.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.14_0: cattāri adhikaraṇāni— vivādādhikaraṇaṁ, anuvādādhikaraṇaṁ, āpattādhikaraṇaṁ, kiccādhikaraṇaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.16_0: tesaṁ lesānaṁ aññataro leso upādinno hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:2.4.18_0: tucchakaṁ mayā bhaṇitaṁ, musā mayā bhaṇitaṁ, abhūtaṁ mayā bhaṇitaṁ, ajānantena mayā bhaṇitaṁ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.1_0: Bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, saṅghādisese saṅghādisesadiṭṭhi hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.4_0: natthi tayā saddhiṁ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṁ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.5_0: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.6_0: Bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, saṅghādisese thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.13_0: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.14_0: Bhikkhu thullaccayaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti thullaccaye thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.22_0: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.26_0: dubbhāsitaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, dubbhāsite dubbhāsitadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.34_0: natthi tayā saddhiṁ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṁ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.1.35_0: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.1_0: Bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti saṅghādisese saṅghādisesadiṭṭhi hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.4_0: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.5_0: Bhikkhu saṅghādisesaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti, saṅghādisese thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.12_0: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.13_0: Bhikkhu thullaccayaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti thullaccaye thullaccayadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.21_0: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.25_0: dubbhāsitaṁ ajjhāpajjanto diṭṭho hoti dubbhāsite dubbhāsitadiṭṭhi hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.33_0: natthi tayā saddhiṁ uposatho vā pavāraṇā vā saṅghakammaṁ vā”ti,
pli-tv-bu-vb-ss9:3.2.34_0: evampi āpattaññabhāgiyaṁ hoti leso ca upādinno, āpatti vācāya, vācāya saṅghādisesassa.
